title: I can't open my lol
body: please help me how can i fix my game, i can't open my lol cuz it say RADS error, Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that your internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access . please help me to fix this :(

replies.body:
this helped me, was posted on the Announcements page under log on issues:

Guys this worked for me:

Go to the right of your task bar and find your Internet connection icon, right click and go to Network Sharing Centre.
Find the "adapter settings". For Windows 8 it's on the panel on the left, not sure for 7 or Mac.
Find your current connection, right click on it, go to Properties
Find "Internet Protocol Version 4", and go into its Properties.
In the DNS Section, instead of automatic, check "Use the following DNS server addresses"
Prefered DNS server: 8.8.8.8
Alternate DNS server: 8.8.4.4
Click OK, exit the settings and try launching LoL again.

try it out, was having the exact same problem and this fixed it.
This fixed it for me too! I'm on a Mac and it worked great. Everyone try this out (:

I can help if this isn't a problem with Riot servers (people with certain configs just aren't able to connect, and Riot don't seem to know about it), but I need some more information.

What OS do you use? Who is your ISP? Are there any other applications open that are also using the internet?
